conclusion: Understand the relationship between the light source, objects, and shadows.
Identify objects: birdcage, chicken leg, small object; light source above.
Determine shadows cast by objects labeled A, B, and C.
Understand relationship: shadow size and position change with light source movement.
Shadows move to the right as light source moves to the right.
Shadow size increases as objects move further to the right.
Conclude changes in shadow size and position based on light source movement.
Shadow A increases in size, shadow B remains the same, shadow C moves to the right.
